sumDscr.universe: Age limits: 16-74 years Location: national Name of country: Netherlands

dataColl.datacollector: Nederlands instituut voor de publieke opinie en het marktonderzoek, NIPO * Amsterdam
dataColl.sampProc: multi-stage sample: first stage sampling of municipalities, stratification of number of households in municipalities;: next stage selection of addresses;: last stage determining per address a cluster of three other addresses and out of these three addresses the respondent was selected Number of unit original/losses: nr. of units in original sample: 2424
dataColl.actMin: follow up visits: 2;: substitution in case of non-existing addresses;: letters: introduction letter
dataColl.weight: weighting variables: caswgt, wegingz;: no description available of weighting procedure and criteria
